nodes.text: The Imperial Governor of Foundry ruled the planet during the Galactic Civil War.

The Governor claimed that Foundry's defenses made the planet impregnable, with fleets and spies being incapable of reaching the world alive, much less escape from its facilities. Despite this boast, a small Rebel team of Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Mici Shabandar, R2-D2 and C-3PO managed to both infiltrate and escape with an experimental Imperial warship, the Staraker.
